Traits.Name: Mob
Traits.Description: This character doesn't trigger slay effects.

Actions.Name: Scrabble
Actions.Description: Deal 1 damage as an effect. If an ally is adjacent to the target, deal 2 damage instead.

SetupTraits.Name: Encounter Budget
SetupTraits.Description: 1 point in an encounter budget gets 5 mobs of the same type.
